activities.name: ⭐ Spelling Workbook
activities.description: Complete one page in spelling workbook

activities.name: Aesop's Fables
activities.description: Read one Aesop’s Fable and then complete the reflection page. First, summarize the story in your own words. Then, answer the questions about the moral and how it applies to your life today.

activities.name: Word Hunter Challenge
activities.description: While you're reading (Aesop's, comics, etc), find 5 words you don't know. For each word, grab your pocket dictionary and look it up. Then, either tell us what it means (from memory), or write the meaning in your own words.

activities.name: Extra Math Page
activities.description: Complete an additional math page. If you don't have one available, ask a parent to generate a new one. You can complete this multiple times per day for additional points.

activities.name: Extra Spelling Page
activities.description: Complete an additional spelling page. If you don't have one available, ask a parent to generate a new one. You can complete this multiple times per day for additional points.

activities.name: Logic Workbook
activities.description: Complete 1 activity from your logic workbook. You can complete this multiple times per day for additional points.

activities.name: Spanish Practice
activities.description: Complete 1 lesson in Studycat on the iPad, or some equivalent activity approved by a parent.

activities.name: Typing Practice
activities.description: Complete 1 lesson in Typing Land on the iPad, or some equivalent activity approved by a parent.
